headline: Discovery's bid to merge with WarnerMedia wins final government approval
author: Brian Stelter
sentences: AT&T is planning to spin off CNN and the rest of WarnerMedia in the coming months, at which point Discovery will merge with WarnerMedia, creating a new juggernaut of streaming and cable content.
Discovery and AT&T (TBB) received a long-awaited green light from the Justice Department on Wednesday, driving the two companies closer to completing Discovery's takeover of WarnerMedia.
The spin-off and merger is likely to take effect in April, according to executives with knowledge of the matter.
It is expected to take place in the coming weeks, and is regarded as a formality.
The final necessary step is a vote by Discovery shareholders.
